name: Lending club default predictions
tagline: A chronicle of our analysis of Lending Club data.
body:
# Lending Rate Default Predictions
_Arthur Aguillar, Dwijo Goswami and James Fallon_

## Data exploration and cleaning

We began by exploring the loan data.   
We were interested in how poorly loans had performed based on when they were issued.  

![](https://thefaulters.github.io/Lending-Club-Default-Predictions/Images/Loans-delinquency-bar.png)

Further, we were interested in whether higher risk borrowers consistently had to pay higher interest rates (and whether they indeed defaulted more often).  
 
![](https://thefaulters.github.io/Lending-Club-Default-Predictions/Images/Risk.png)
